Class.name: ITB.HL7.BS.TCPXMLService
Class.Description: Business Service that receives HL7 (XML) through TCP (MLLP) and sends it as EnsLib.HL7.Message to targets returning the corresponding Ack (XML) to source

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

Method.name: OnProcessInput
